document.full_text: the groan of excavators, abandoned pits filled with stagnant brown water and the local chief's expensive off-road car hint at the mine tucked away in a bamboo forest in dikoto, western ghana.
document.title: ghana's gold rush lures chinese with illicit mines
lines_and_colors: the groan of excavators, abandoned pits filled with stagnant brown water and the local chief's expensive off-road car hint at the mine tucked away in a bamboo forest in dikoto, western ghana.
